body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera, Otovoda 3Inch Screen WiFi Dash cam, 2.5K+1080P Dash Camera for Cars, Dashboard Camera with Free 64GB SD Card, Type-C Port, Parking Monitor, Super Night Vision
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 3 hrs 40 mins
features: 【2.5K+1080P Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera】This dual dash cam simultaneous records with Super High Resolution 2.5K front+1080P rear, clearly capture the license plates as well as road signs during the day and night. Besides, the front 170°wide-angle and rear 140°dash camera ensure to reduce blind area, provides the most important evidence for car accidents.

【Build in Wi-Fi and Smart APP Control】This dash cam for cars comes with WiFi function, you can view real-time videos, playback and download videos from dash cam via free viidure APP(Work with Android and iOS devices). Also, you can share your travel scenery and beautiful moments with friends and family by one click.

【Car Camera with Super Night Vision】The car camera dash cam front and rear adopts an excellent optical lens with an ultra-large F1.8 aperture and 6 layers, and comes with WDR technology, capturing important details clearly under low light conditions, making less disputes.

【24 Hours Parking Monitor Dashboard Camera】This car camera recorder will auto turn on and lock the current video to save evidence when the car takes collision in parking. If you install this car dash cam with hard wire kit, car dash camera can give your car 7x24 monitor. Accident scene can be truly restored and give you piece of mind. Drive safer, Park smarter.

【Compact and Super Easy to Install】This is a compact, exquisite and powerful dash camera with 3Inch display, which won't obstruct your vision while driving. Meanwhile, this dashcam has loop recording, WDR, G-sensor function, Type-C port and so on, dash cam support up to 256GB SD card, 64GB SD card is included. Also, the dash cam for cars is easily been mounted to your car’s windshield with the included suction cup and holder. Plug It and Start go.

【Reliable After-sales Service】This dash cam for cars front and rear comes with an extendable 2 Years warranty and Full Refund within 30 days. If you have any questions or accessories are missed, please let us know, we provide technical support-respond within 24 hours, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee for this car dash cam.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Otovoda B-T50 Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear--2.5K+1080P WiFi Dash Cam--Compact, exquisite and powerful dash camera. This Otovoda Dual Dash cam offers exceptional video quality and a wide field of view, ensuring clear and comprehensive footage of your journeys. The setup was a breeze, and the user-friendly interface makes operating the dash cam a breeze. It's a reliable and durable device that provides you with peace of mind during your drives, your most reliable partner on journeys. MOST IMPORTANTLY: 1. A 64GB SD Card is included in this Dash Cam, and this dash camera can support up to 256 GB, Class 10, U3 Speed Micro-SD Memory Card. Please format the SD Card on computer or on car camera first before recording. ✘ Please DON'T USE any "SanDisk Ultra" or other "Generic Class 10" Cards from third-party sellers. They are NOT made for high write and read speed for this dash cam. 2. The car camera is equipped with a small battery for saving emergency file and setting only. The dash cam will shut down after 5mins if there is no externally power connection. External power is required when it is working.

2.5K+1080P Dash Cam Front and Rear Camera This dual dash cam simultaneous records with Super High Resolution 2.5K front+1080P rear, clearly capture the license plates as well as road signs during the day and night. Besides, the front 170°wide-angle and rear 140°dash camera ensure to reduce blind area, provides the most important evidence for car accidents. Kind Reminder: ✔Please make sure the rear camera plug is fully inserted in to the main camera, otherwise the rear camera video won't be shown on screen.

WiFi Dash Cam--Smart App With WiFi function, sharing your travel scenery and beautiful moments with friends and family is not a problem anymore. You can view real-time videos, playback and download videos from dash cam via free viidure APP(Work with Android and iOS devices). Warm Tip: ✔The WiFi signal range of this dash camera is about 10FT, car dash cam will auto disconnected if out of range.

Car Camera with Super Night Vision The car camera dash cam front and rear adopts an excellent optical lens with an ultra-large F1.8 aperture and 6 layers, and comes with WDR technology, capturing important details clearly under low light conditions, making less disputes.

Dash Cam with Loop Recording Powerful loop recording function will automatically overwrite oldest and unlocked videos to prevent memory card being full. Locked videos can not be overwritten. Accident scene can be truly restored and give you piece of mind.Videos can be recorded in 1/3/5 minutes clips. Dash Camera for Car with Intelligent Gravity Sensor Triggered by G-sensor, this dashboard camera can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwritten even in loop recording. Accident scene can be truly restored. ✔If red dot change yellow dot upper right corner when dash cam detect a shake, it means that the video is locked. Dashcam with 24 Hours Parking Monitor Parking monitor : When switch to parking mode, this dash cam will turn on and auto record and lock the video files if a collision or shaking is detected. ✔If you install this car dash cam with hard wire kit(Not included), car dash camera can give your car 7x24 monitor. Accident scene can be truly restored and give you piece of mind. Drive safer, Park smarter.

Dashboard Camera with Type-C Port This dash cam comes with a Type-C Port car charger power cord. It ensures faster transmission speed and less issues like black screen, restarting problem. Dash Camera with 64GB Memory Card This dash camera comes with a 64GB Memory Card. It can support max to 256GB, Class 10, U3 memory card. The larger support storage allows you to store more videos of your excellent trip. Please format SD Card on dash cam first before recording. Powerful and Waterproof Rear Camera This dash cam comes with a 1080P high resolution 140°wide angle rear camera, which provides four lane coverage without any blind spot from back of your car. The rear camera can be installed on both inside and outside of vehicles.

3 Inch Compact Dash Cam-- Easy Installation This is a compact, exquisite and powerful dash camera with 3Inch display, which won't obstruct your vision while driving. Also, the dash cam for cars is easily been mounted to your car’s windshield with the included suction cup and holder. Plug It and Start go. Dash Cam with Suction Cup It is very easy to install it. This is a 360° rotatable suction cup mount. 1. Attach the suction cup mount to the camera’s mount connector.(Refer to part 1 in the picture) 2. Push the suction cup mount to the left until it clicked.(Refer to part 2 in the picture) 3. Attach the suction cup mount and dash cam to the windshield. 4. Plug car charger to the cigarette lighter socket, then start your car and go. Package Content · 1 x B-T50 Main Dash Cam; 1 x Waterproof Rear Camera · 1 x 2.5ft USB Data Cable; 1 x Type-C Car Charger · 1 x 64 GB SD Card;1 x User Manual · 1 x Operation Video Card; 1 x Pin · 5 x Cable Hiding Clips Specification · Display: 3 inch LED · Front+Rear Mode Resolution: 2.5K+1080P · Power Port: Type-C / Rear Cam Port: AV · Video Format: MP4 / Audio: Built in microphone and MIC · WiFi: Support / Loop Recording: 1/3/5 minutes 3 Inch Compact Dash Cam-- Easy Installation Dash Cam with Suction Cup Package Content Specification

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 Star 2.5K+ Dash Cam from Otovoda
reviews.reviewText: Video Quality: 5 StarThe video quality is outstanding, capturing crisp and clear footage in both daylight and low-light conditions. The wide-angle lens ensures that every detail is captured, allowing for accurate documentation of incidents.Ease of Installation: 5 StarSetting up the dash camera was a breeze. The included mounting hardware and easy-to-follow instructions made the installation process seamless. Within minutes, it was securely in place and ready to record.User-Friendly Interface: 5 StarNavigating the menu and adjusting settings on the dash camera is incredibly intuitive. The buttons are responsive, and the interface is straightforward, making it easy to customize preferences and review footage.Loop Recording and G-Sensor: 5 StarThe loop recording feature ensures that I never have to worry about running out of storage space. It seamlessly overwrites the oldest files, guaranteeing that important footage is never lost. Additionally, the G-sensor immediately locks and protects files in the event of a collision, providing crucial evidence for insurance claims.Parking Mode: 5 StarThe parking mode function is a game-changer. It automatically activates when motion or impact is detected, safeguarding my vehicle even when I'm not around. This added layer of security has given me peace of mind when leaving my car unattended.Build Quality: 5 StarThe dash camera feels durable and well-made. It's designed to withstand various weather conditions, ensuring it performs reliably over time.Overall Value: 5 StarConsidering the features, video quality, ease of use, and reliability, the Dash Camera offers exceptional value for its price. It's a small investment that provides significant benefits in terms of safety and security.Final Thoughts:I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the Dash Camera. It has become an indispensable tool for my daily commute, offering peace of mind and a sense of security on the road. The exceptional video quality, user-friendly interface, and advanced features make it a top-notch choice for anyone looking to enhance their driving experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: When the one in my car broke, I bought one on Amazon. The one I chose was relatively good for the price. The installation is simple. After downloading the APP and testing the picture quality, I felt it was very good. The road conditions can be seen clearly, and the APP operation is very simple without too many functions. The merchant also provides an SD card, which saves you the need to buy another one yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent budget dashcam, a must buy!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is an absolute stunner of a dashcam at this price! After comparing many products, I bought this dual-cam dash cam for my new car.After using it for 2 weeks, here is what I think.PROS:1. Extremely easy to install. The booklet and the YT videos make it very easy to install the product on you own.2. Picture quality is super clear (@ 2.5K/1080 resolution). The full HD resolution ensures clear footage, even in the dark. The lens has a wide angle view capturing every details.3. The product comes with an app which can help you setup the camera settings. And it is extremely easy to format the SD card in seconds.4. The G-sensor technology detects shocks or collisions and automatically saves that footage, which I have confirmed myself.5. The loop recording feature is a plus, without you having to worry about storage.6. Customer support from the seller is amazing, they promptly responded to my queries.CONS:1. The rear camera requires some effort to install (it could be just me). The rear camera quality is okay as compared to the front. You can make out license details from the rear cam recordings, but will find it difficult to find minute details.Overall, I am satisfied with the purchase and would recommend to my friends as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality driving recorder
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to buy a dash cam because I wasn’t sure if I needed it, but I found this one at a good price and thought I’d try it. I’m glad I did. The instructions were clear and all the equipment came nicely packaged. This comes with both a front and rear camera. I’m only going to use the front cam, because I want to avoid using the long cord to connect the two. The picture on the camera is very clear and the suction to keep it on the front window is very strong. This will be handy to use on long drives. I’m glad I decided to get this. I like this dash cam very much because it is easy to install, has high definition, has a large battery capacity, and has a fast video source, which makes me feel safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget dashcam
reviews.reviewText: Bought this camera for my girlfriend. The cameras are really small so it's easy to hide, just have to deal with hiding the cable but, it was very simple to install. The camera turns on/off whenever the car is turned on/off which makes it easy to use. You can easily download the footage directly to your phone or computer.It works great, with 1080p, which is all you really need because you don't want to use too much space and gives more spread of the timeline of recording. It will overwrite previous recordings which is nice so you only need the footage of when something happens and not worry about managing the storage.Overall, a really good budget camera you can easily install and forget about!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice enough camera and good features
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice camera with fairly easy setup instructions. The screen on the back is nice, big, and clear. I didn't set up the rear camera because running the wire wasn't an easy adventure. Though I tested it and it worked well.

I wanted a dash camera to mount in a vehicle that I drive back and forth from western NL to Florida in. When traveling such long distances on busy highways, a lot can happen and I wanted protection in case of a dispute. This camera had all the features I needed and then some and had good reviews. For the price I think its a bargain for the protection it provides. It even has an extra camera you can direct out the back window, or at the driver and passengers or wherever. The front camera mounting hardware with suction cup seems to be of good quality although the little cable clips for securing the cables are kind of cheap and will barely stick to smooth plastic or glass. I had to get creative when running the cable for the rear camera but they were plenty long even for a full size SUV. I used the provided bracket and 3M tape and stuck the rear camera to the inside of the back window but you can mount it outside on a bumper as well although it would get pretty dirty out there I think.You can save video on the camera itself or use the app on your phone and save and share video from there. It was fairly easy to set up and use. It comes with a built in memory card which is convenient. You can lock videos manually with the touch of a button or the camera will automatically lock it if it senses a sudden jarring like when an accident occurs. You can also set it up to record video if it senses movement when the car is parked overnight in a driveway or parking lot and someone is trying to steal it. However you have to connect it to an uninterrupted power supply to the car battery in order for this to work which I didn't do.Both cameras front and back have very good video quality both day and night, even licence plate numbers of other vehicles are readable.Overall, I think its a good investment for the protection and I'll see how good it is a year from now and beyond. Hopefully I'll never have to submit any video to the police!

This is based on front and rear installation, just one trip and downloads, but have not tried motion sensing or parking features so read on:Well packed in the box with components not looking cheap at all. There is an extra unmentioned plastic tool for installing cable behind rubber seals. User manual is a good quality booklet in colour so not cheap at all. It would be nice to have one or two spare 3M sticking pads as I found out.Installation was straight forward with adequate, sturdy cables, unfortunately of plastic so inflexible at 0°C. Suction cup and lever for installing are good. One design fault is that above the camera there is little room for the mount, cable from rear cam and power cable. See in the photo how the USB cable end is pushed over by the suction cup and there is no room to get fingers onto the cam position lock nut. I think the rear cam cannot be installed with cam above mount (like on the roof) because the image would appear upside down. No provision in software to invert it.Can't comment on picture quality but don't forget to remove lens plastic protectors. Seven buttons on the sides of the cam are accessible and labeled on the front bezel so you can see what each does. Connection to the phone app is straight forward and video clips download via WiFi OK. I note that the cam records files for both front and rear whether you want the rear or not. I will keep the rear plugged in because my van needs it as a back-up camera, which performs that function well.So 5 star and so far so good.

I've had a couple of months with this camera now and overall it is a great dash cam. The front-facing camera has exceptional image quality for the price and the rear camera is pretty decent. Installation is relatively simple and the build quality feel is good. I've had no issues with the camera so far over the last couple of months using it. There are a couple of small things that could be addressed to make this better. First, the USB C connector for the camera is a straight cable and can be challenging to plug in and unplug if your vehicle has a sloping windshield. As you can see, the cable is wedged up against my windshield which is not ideal, but it's the only way I can plug it in. It would be better if the USB C had a 90° end on it. Second, the adhesive on the provided cable clips is not very strong. Overall, for the price I paid, it is a solid camera.

The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the Otovoda 3-Inch Screen Dash Cam, and it has truly exceeded my expectations in terms of functionality and performance. This dash cam offers a comprehensive solution for capturing both front and rear views, ensuring all-around protection and documentation on the road.Design & Build Quality:The dash cam boasts a sleek, compact design that doesn't obstruct the windshield view. Its sturdy build quality and straightforward mounting system make installation hassle-free.Video Quality:Impressive video quality is observed in both the front and rear cameras. The front camera captures crisp 1080p footage with a wide-angle lens, delivering clear and detailed recordings of the road ahead. Meanwhile, the rear camera, with its 720p resolution, adequately captures the surroundings behind the vehicle, providing essential coverage for any incidents or accidents.Night Vision & Low-Light Performance:One standout feature is its exceptional night vision capabilities. This dash cam performs admirably in low-light conditions, ensuring clear and detailed footage even during nighttime drives or in poorly lit areas. Its enhanced low-light performance greatly contributes to round-the-clock monitoring.Loop Recording & G-Sensor:The loop recording function manages storage space seamlessly by overwriting older footage, while the built-in G-sensor detects collisions and locks the relevant footage, preventing it from being overwritten. This ensures crucial footage is safeguarded in case of an accident.User-Friendly Interface:Navigating through settings and accessing recordings is straightforward, thanks to the intuitive interface. The dash cam's menu system is easy to understand, and the responsive buttons allow for quick adjustments and customization.Additional Features:The Otovoda 3-Inch Screen Dash Cam comes equipped with extra features like parking mode, providing surveillance for the vehicle even when parked, and motion detection, triggering recording when motion is sensed around the car.Conclusion:Overall, the Otovoda 3-Inch Screen Dash Cam offers an excellent value proposition with its reliable performance, impressive video quality, and comprehensive coverage of both front and rear views. It's a dependable companion for enhancing safety and providing evidence in case of road incidents. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a reliable and feature-rich dash cam solution.

This dashcam is amazing, small convenient to carry, and has a stronger suction power. It is easy to install, with good picture and video quality that provides clear and sharp images and excellent of surroundings. The APP provides simple operation setting. The Wi-Fi function allows you to connect it to your smartphone. By downloading the dedicated app, you can view, download, and share the recorded footage directly on your smartphone.
